string-array.name: description
string-array.item: The sun is at the center of the solar system. The Sun is 93 million miles from the Earth. It is the largest object in the solar system. Its diameter, or distance through its center, is 865,000 miles (1,392,000 kilometers)
Mecury is the first planet from the sun. It is also the smallest planet in the solar system
Venus is the second planet from the sun. It is also the brightest and the hottest planet in our solar system. It is sometimes called teh bright morning star
Earth is the planet we are in. It is the third planet from the sun. It can support life and that is why we live on it
Mars is the fourth planet form the sun. It is red in color and also said to have been able to support life at some point in history
Jupiter is the fifth planet form the sun. It is the largest planet in our solar system yet made of gas.
Sartun is the sixth planet in out solar system. Some say it is the most beautiful planet because of the beautiful rings fo gas around it
Neptune the seventh planet form the su. It is blue in color and furthest star from the sun
